area_code = | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = BWk | website = | footnotes = }} Calama is a commune and city of Chile. It is the capital of Province of El Loa, and is in the Region of Antofagasta. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cities in Chile Category:Antofagasta Region
